remarks:
Establish equality between classes, using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions.  See also ~ cleqf . (Contributed by NM, 26-May-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 14-Nov-2019.) 

---

 Establish equality between classes, using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions.  See also ~ cleqf . (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
cleqh.1 $e |- ( y e. A -> A. x y e. A ) $.
cleqh.2 $e |- ( y e. B -> A. x y e. B ) $.
cleqh $p |- ( A = B <-> A. x ( x e. A <-> x e. B ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d B y $.
$d x y $.
